text:
Game is not recognizing solids or strips when potted. I potted stripped ball which was my ball and the fam gave turn to the opportunity stating that I did not pot the correct ball. 

The first time it happened I thought I may have made a mistake. But after it happened another 2-3 times I was dumbfounded.

title: Deleting Reviews
text: I wrote a review years ago stating how the game pitted me against bots and drained me of coins but since it has been deleted I’ll write another, more updated review. I’ll center this one around the fact that the game has gotten significantly more boring and frustrating over time. The challenges aren’t as fun. The Pool Pass takes double the amount of time to complete and the rewards from the pool pass have become less enticing. Before you could win a couple Lucky Shots with some hefty rewards like 60 pool cash. Now, you have the chance of winning one. Given the shot is rigged and somehow your cue power does not function the same on these, it was nice to have the extra to adjust and MAYBE win something. They took that away. The app in general feels a bit more glitchy as well and not as smooth to operate. Ultimately Miniclip continues to become more and more money hungry catering more toward players with billions of coins and those willing to pay real money to play. Not fun for the average player anymore.

title: Ripoff
text: This game is a complete ripoff. As soon as I spent money, it started pairing me with players that are 1 or 200 levels ahead of me, and I got to break 1 out of every 10 games or so which would often result in me losing without taking a shot. Don’t spend a nickel on this game. Better yet, delete it all together.

title: Filled with cheaters
text:
Been playing this game for years! It is the closest thing to real life pool with realistic cue ball control and effects. However, of late, it’s been filled with cheaters using hacks to win games.

Their cue automatically lines up to hit 3 and 5 cushion shots each time to make the most ridiculous, impossible pots multiple times in a row. Not sure what the hackers get by winning fake coins with no $ value, but clearly gives them some pleasure. 

It’s just annoying and the game developers don’t seem to take any action or fix it.

title: Cheating
text: This game is truly awesome. It showcases skills of the game, English users, trick shots, and knowledge of the game. But once you start to take your skills to higher tables, players use cheating tactics to win. Either run the table to lose. Tables under 25 million showcase skills whereas higher tables rely on cheat lines to know how to play. Ruins the fun of the game.

title: Good Game But Filled With Hackers
text:
This is a good game to spend some time on, it is enjoyable, well made, and in general, the experience is really good as you’re leveling up, getting new and powerful cues, as well as playing on higher bet tables. They definitely have it figured out in regards to user experience.
The problem with this game, and it is a huge one, is that it is filled with Hackers, mostly on high bet tables. I’ve been playing this game for years and have billions in coins, so obviously I opt to play in the table with most money, and I’ve had days in which I play against many hackers, one day I matched up against 7 different ones in a row… it just gets to a point where it is too many too often and it seems like they don’t care at all.
All I can say is that there seems to be more and more hackers everyday and they are not committed nor willing to do something to change that.

title: Bugs
text: I don’t like that when you’re about to start playing and you click 1v1 and it’s automatically on entry fee of 500,000 coins. I was trying to swipe over and accidentally clicked it and hit the red button to go back and it made me play it anyway. Then to make matters worse the person I was paired with was 3x my level and was obviously better than I was. Im only complaining because I didn’t want to play and clicked off before the match started and it forced me in the match anyway and I lost all of my coins so I uninstalled the app!

title: Ads are terrible
text: I've been playing this game for years, it's a good game. However, the ads are absolutely awful and make playing the game not fun. You can't leave or finish a single game without 3-4 ads popping up after each one. And they're the same ads every time! No I do not want to spend $15-$30 on pool cues - stop asking! I also wish that after you finish a game, the game options automatically goes back to the game you were playing. If I want to play the 100 coin bets each game, it shouldn't restart and start at the game option where you can accidentally click on it and bet all your coins. Lastly, once you finish a game, there should always be a button to play a new game without having to verse the same person or leave out of the finished game screen to choose a new game. Maybe also add in free chat options for people you're friends with? The quality of the app has gone down the past couple years.

title: The amount of cheating is making this game unplayable
text:
The actual game play is decent, although far too many advertisements.

The major problem is that there are a massive amount of cheaters now, to the point where it’s pretty much unplayable now.  The reporting system is terrible to because by the time you’re sure that the opponent is cheating there isn’t time to report the cheaters.  The reporting system closes the instant that the game is over, so even if you’re making a report you often can actually complete it, and you can’t make the report after the game is over.

This game needs a major revamp to address both the cheating issue and the reporting issue.
